title: can i have 2 rps pls
body:
hey it me, can i pls have 2 rp so i can buy hextech crate. i spent 4 hour to draw pic 4 u, its my boy drav in som sexc red short.
thank riot u r my bby gurl i will kiss u if u do.[](http://imgur.com/UU0IymX)

replies.body:
Your picture is so beautiful I was brought to tears for a moment {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 

But if you want your 2 RP, you'll have to send your masterpiece in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to **Riot**. The category doesn't matter, just find whatever you think fits best.
